title: Number of eSports games players worldwide 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Sport in the x axis and Number of players in millions in the y axis.
The Number of players in millions is appeared to be the highest at Sport League of Legends and lowest at Sport StarCraft II.
The highest Sport League of Legends has 97.6 more Number of players in millions than the lowest Sport StarCraft II.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Sport, and Number of players in millions in each Sport on the y axis.
The Number of players in millions is highest at Sport League of Legends and lowest at Sport StarCraft II.
